title: Tips on Caring for Jewelry
bodyhtml:
Jewelry is one of our most intimate and cherished accessories. Understanding how to care for and protect your treasured jewelry can make a world of difference in maintaining its beauty and keeping your heirlooms sparkling for generations to come.

BE CAREFUL WITH LIGHT AND HEAT

Just as the sun’s harmful rays can damage our skin, light and heat can affect a colored gemstone’s durability and color. Over time, and in excess, they can also fade or damage some gemstones, such as amethyst, kunzite, topaz and shell cameos. Pearls and other delicate materials, such as ivory, will bleach under extreme exposure to light. Other gems, especially amber, can darken over time when exposed to too much light.

Excessive heat and sudden temperature changes may also fracture some gems. Heat can easily remove the natural moisture these gems need to keep their beauty. Pearls, for instance, can dry out, crack and discolor. Opals can turn white or brown, develop tiny cracks, and might lose their play-of-color.

KEEP YOUR JEWELRY AWAY FROM CHEMICALS

Exposure to chemicals can damage or discolor precious metals – gold, silver and platinum – and may harm some colored gems. Even everyday substances like hairspray, lotion, perfume or other cosmetics can contain chemicals that will permanently damage the surface of your pearls and other delicate or porous gems (like turquoise). Fine jewelry should be removed before diving into a chlorinated swimming pool or before using household cleaners. Many of these cleaners contain ammonia, which can be too harsh for delicate gems or vintage jewelry. Chlorine bleach, another common household solvent, can pit or damage gold alloys.

GIVE TREATED GEMS SPECIAL CARE

Many colored gemstones are routinely treated to improve the appearance of color and clarity. These treatments can be negatively affected by heat, solvents, steam and ultrasonic cleaners. Knowing whether your gem has been treated is the first step to knowing how to care for it. This is where a GIA report comes in – it contains important information about your gem and any detectable treatments it may have undergone.

USE ULTRASONIC CLEANERS WITH CAUTION

While you can purchase a professional ultrasonic cleaner for $150 or less, you should be aware that not all gems and jewelry can be safely cleaned in it.

Ultrasonic cleaners should not be used to clean:

  • Gemstones with surface-reaching breaks that have been filled with a substance such as oil, resin or a glass-like material
  • Organic gem materials such as pearls, coral, ivory, or amber
  • Gems that have been coated with a non-permanent substance like plastic or wax
  • Some heat-treated gemstones
  • Gems that are susceptible to heat and temperature changes whether they are treated or not. Some of these gems include tanzanite, feldspar (sunstone and moonstone), fluorite, iolite, kunzite, lapis lazuli, malachite, opal, topaz, turquoise, zircon and others

What’s more, the vibration generated by the machine can sometimes shake gems loose or chip gems that are set with their girdles touching.

This type of cleaning is best left to jewelry professionals who know about different gem materials and understand when and how to use the ultrasonic cleaner safely.

THE SAFEST CLEANING METHODS ARE ALSO THE EASIEST

Most colored gems can be cleaned with warm water, mild dish soap (no detergents) and a soft brush. A pulsed-water dental cleaning appliance and a soft, lint-free cloth can also be used. Be sure to rinse your jewelry in a glass of water to remove cleaning solutions since you risk losing loose stones – or even an entire piece of jewelry - if you rinse directly in the sink.

Soft gems, such as pearls, on the other hand, can easily scratch. Use a new, clean makeup brush and warm, soapy water to gently clean them. Lay a strand of pearls on a towel to dry. The wet silk thread can stretch - and attract dirt - so don’t touch your strand until it is completely dry. Pearls worn often should be restrung once a year.

SAFELY STORE YOUR JEWELRY

Proper jewelry storage is often overlooked. Jewelry should never be tossed into a drawer or on top of a dresser - that’s asking for scratches and damaged gems.

Most jewelry pieces come in a box or pouch from the store, which is a perfect place to keep them. Sterling silver, for example, should be kept in an anti-tarnish bag or cloth. Jewelry boxes that feature individually padded slots for rings and posts for hanging necklaces and bracelets are also ideal.

Pearls and opals draw moisture from the air, so storing your opal or pearl jewelry in a dry area, such as a safe deposit box, can sometimes do more harm than good.

When traveling, protect your jewelry pieces from scratches or other impact damage by padding it in a separate box or case.

All Malani Jewelers locations offer free check-ups or professional cleaning at scheduled intervals: Jewelry should be checked every six months and cleaned frequently.

GOLD JEWELRY TARNISHING PREVENTION

Possible causes include:

  1. Perspiration (everyone’s body chemistry is different, hence this is why some are more susceptible than others); for women, the time can influence their body chemistry.
  2. Perfume, hair or deodorant sprays, make-up or cosmetic chemicals
  3. Tarnishing during storage (storage boxes may contain organic sulphur compounds),
  4. Leaching of acid/ cleaning solutions from surface microporosity from cast jewellery; this causes corrosion locally (such porosity may cause perspiration during wear, causing local corrosion)
  5. Preparation of vegetables such as onions and spices (many foodstuffs contain sulphur compounds and others are also acidic). Another possible mechanism may be surface micro-porosity on the surface of investment (lost wax) cast items. This porosity may interact with other cleaning solutions, sprays, or perspiration and cause a local corrosion which ‘creeps’ over the surface of the item. The tarnish films formed are generally harmless although unsightly and may lead to a black smudging of the skin. This is easily polished off by a jeweler to restore the bright gold colour.

Possible solutions to the problem include:

  1. Store jewelry in a pouch or bag in a dry atmosphere (unpolluted, e.g. by exhaust fumes, solvent vapours, where possible).
  2. If stored in a box or pouch or plastic bag, ensure it is free of sulphur-containing compounds (from solvents, fabric treatments, etc.)
  3. Polish jewelry regularly with a soft cloth to remove any early tarnish film, perspiration and other contaminants (sprays, etc). Clean well and do not put on perfume, deodorants, sprays, etc whilst wearing the jewelry.
  4. Where microporosity is a cause, thoroughly clean in an ultrasonic cleaning bath to remove any trapped tarnishing agents.
  5. Electroplate the item with pure, 24 ct gold to provide a tarnish resistant surface. This will eventually wear through during use. A silver lacquer may help.

title: Clean and Conflict Free
bodyhtml:
Malani, Inc. is committed to effective environmental management as one of its

important corporate priorities, and will focus on the following initiatives:

  1. Compliance with all applicable environmental laws and regulations
  2. Measuring the impact of each of our operations on the environment will be systematically assessed for compliance with appropriately defined standards and reviewed periodically to mitigate or eliminate such impact.
  3. Improvement of employee environmental awareness and performance through detailed policies and procedures, training, and recognition of excellence.
  4. Measurement of environmental performance through auditing with employee accountability and reporting to senior management.

Gold Sourcing Policy

Malani, Inc. is concerned about the environmental and social impacts of irresponsible mining. We at Malani, Inc. will ensure that all our gold suppliers comply with internationally known gold sourcing guidelines. Furthermore, we are committed to ensure that our sourcing of gold, precious metals products, and articles are under the highest Social, Human Right and Environmental standard of trade such as Dodd Frank and Signet SRSP.

Synthetic Diamonds

Malani, Inc. is committed to the fight against undisclosed synthetic diamonds. The following methodology has to be adopted for ensuring compliance to undisclosed synthetic diamonds:

  1. Access to effective detection system
  2. Buying from trusted suppliers
  3. Reporting of undisclosed synthetics to supplier and interested parties whenever detected
  4. Recording the incidents of contamination reported and implementing suitable corrective and preventive measures for effective controls
  5. Classifying contamination of points into different category (High, Medium & Low)
  6. Identify the policy, procedure and test mechanism to implement the test mechanism in the organization.
  7. Necessary declaration of compliance is obtained from the supply chain and chain of assurance is passed on to the customers by printing synthetic declarations on all our invoices.

Disclosure of Treated Diamonds, Synthetics and Stimulant

The following essential principles will be applicable in all the transactions involving treated diamonds, synthetics and stimulant.

  1. Full disclosure i.e. the complete and total release of all available information about a Diamond and all material steps it has undergone prior to sale to the purchaser, irrespective of whether or not the information is specifically requested and regardless of the effect on the value of the diamond.
  2. No misuse of terminology or mis-representations or attempts to disguise the product will be made in the selling, advertising and distribution of treated diamonds, synthetics and simulant.
  3. The word ‘diamond’ will not be used in the case of names of firms, manufacturers or trademarks; in connection with treated diamonds or diamond simulant or synthetic diamonds.
  4. Compliance with MAP of De Beers in the entire supply chain and ensure trust of retail customers is maintained.

Kimberley Process and System of Warranties

Malani, Inc. is fully committed in complying with all the requirements specified in the Kimberley Process Certification Scheme and World Diamond Council’s (WDC) System of Warranties Declaration. The definition of ‘Conflict Gem Stone Diamonds’ as agreed by the Kimberley Process has been adopted and a declaration is received from all manufacturing sites and suppliers to ensure these requirements are upheld.

Health and Safety

Malani, Inc. recognizes the need to develop a sustainable, value-creating business and is committed to the following:

  1. Any adverse impact of our business processes on those who carry it out shall be identified and eliminated. Towards this end, we will systematically review our operations to identify sources of health and safety-related risks.
  2. This review will use appropriate standards as required by prevailing laws, expert opinion, and our knowledge of best practices.
  3. The review will lead to the formulation of clearly described work practices and drills.
  4. All our staff will be trained in the manner required to adhere to these work practices and drills.
  5. The health of our staff, exposed to certain hazardous processes, will be monitored periodically through appropriate medical checks, and reviewed using expert inputs for improvements.
  6. Workers shall not be under the influence of or abusing, drugs, alcohol, and/ or other illegal substances.
  7. All workplaces will be constructed to meet safety standards with local regulations as the minimum standards that will be applicable.

title: Jewelry Etiquette
bodyhtml:
People have been wearing jewelry for centuries in order to enhance their overall look or to make a statement of status. While trends come and go, there are still some basic guidelines that are timeless. One of the most important things to remember is that you need to be aware of what is considered proper attire for each situation and choose your jewelry accordingly.

Everyday Jewelry

Some pieces of jewelry are perfectly acceptable to wear all the time. If you are married, one such item is the wedding band. If you like to keep track of time, and you prefer not to use your cell phone for that purpose, a wristwatch is always acceptable. A simple keepsake necklace is another jewelry piece that can be worn most of the time.

Office Jewelry

When you choose jewelry to wear to work, select pieces that aren't too distracting or noisy. You can still show your individuality, but try not to wear anything that might intimidate your colleagues or clients.

Here are some dos and don'ts for office jewelry:

  • In a conservative office, it's a good idea to stick to stud earrings that complement or match your outfit.
  • In a less conservative office, you can wear stud earrings or small hoops as long as they do not sparkle too brightly, attract too much attention or make too much noise when you move.
  • In a more creative environment, larger earrings are acceptable, but it's still a good idea to select those that are not too noisy, or you will likely distract others.
  • Try to stay away from wearing noisy bracelets to any type of office or workplace. Stacking bangles or bracelets that clang against your desk when you're at the keyboard can be quite the distraction.
  • When you're not sure if you are wearing too much jewelry to the office, go with the fewest pieces possible. A general rule of thumb is that it's okay to wear a watch or bracelet, a ring, a pair of earrings, and a necklace. Anything more than that is probably too much for most work environments.

Jewelry for a Formal Event

A formal event is a time to show how elegant you can be, and this is the time to wear your best jewelry. Although it's acceptable to sparkle all over, it's best to choose one piece of jewelry to emphasize your best feature. For example, if you're wearing your hair up, show off your facial features with some stunning diamond earrings. A statement necklace can also bring an onlookers' eyes up to your face.

Remember that jewelry is supposed to accessorize your outfit. Wearing too much of it, even to a formal event, distracts from the overall look.

Jewelry recommendations for a formal event:

  • Pull out the pearls, diamonds, and other precious stones to wear to a formal event.
  • Don't overwhelm your appearance with too much jewelry.
  • Don't wear more than one oversized piece of jewelry, or you may appear too ostentatious with your look.
  • Select one statement piece and downplay the rest of your jewelry.
  • Although it is acceptable to wear a set, be careful not to match too identically. A nice contrasting piece of jewelry can highlight your outfit perfectly.

Jewelry for a Traditional Event

Jewelry has been an integral part of Indian culture for thousands of years, and is worn for almost every occasion. Known for being elaborate, intricate, detailed and colorful, Indian jewelry types are bold and eye-catching. Let’s take a look at Indian jewelry types and how to choose the perfect piece for traditional indian events.

Events where it is acceptable to wear traditional indian jewelry:

  • Wedding or engagement functions
  • A formal party while wearing a traditional indian saree or salwar
  • Religious, cultural, or auspicious occasions including but not limited to Diwali, Eid, Dhanteras, Navratri, Karva Chauth, Ritu Kala Samskara/Ritushuddhi, etc.

Different Types of Traditional Jewelry:

Temple Jewelry

The regal look of the temple jewelry which originated in the 9th century forms a valuable part of South India’s cultural heritage. It has gained a lot of popularity among women and is used by classical dancers to add divinity and uniqueness to their look. Women wear it for attaining a graceful appearance at bridal functions or other traditional occasions. However, nowadays the craze for temple jewelry is heightened as it is made available in various forms according to the requirements of the buyers.

Today, the usage of temple jewelry is not limited to certain occasions, but also used by women to boost their style quotient on ordinary days. It is certainly loved by women who yearn to flaunt a completely astonishing look. Wearing the highly creative designs of temple jewelry not only adds to a person’s glamour, but also becomes a status symbol as such jewelry can’t be owned by everyone as it’s quite expensive.

Kundan Jewelry (also known as Jaipuri Jewelry)

Kundan jewelry is one of the most popular types of Indian jewelry, and is especially famous in Rajasthan. It refers to a type of gemstone jewelry, where highly refined gold and 24Karat sealing methods are combined with gorgeous gemstones to create elaborate and intricate pieces. The word ‘kundan’ means pure gold.

What defines kundan jewelry is the layer upon layer of stones and metals that are joined to form beautiful designs. Each stone is mounted in its own metal foil, which frames it, accentuates its shape and separates it from the other stones in the design.

Kundan is typically worn by brides, wedding guests or to any formal function. Many modern Indian women style kundan jewelry with contemporary clothing to give it a chic and modern look.

Meenakari Jewelry

Meenakari refers to an enamel technique that is used in various types of Indian jewelry.The beauty of meenakari is in its vivid, bright colors and smooth, polished appearance. It’s an excellent jewelry style for fun, modern pieces as well as for traditional Indian designs.

When you look at a piece of meenakari jewelry, you might assume at first that it’s all colorful gemstones, but on closer observation, you’ll notice the enamel artwork. Meenakari is typically paired with pearls, diamonds and other colorful gemstones.

Polki Jewelry

Polki jewelry is one of the most notable types and is stunning when crafted properly. Polki features rough, uncut diamonds paired with gold and other gemstones. The diamonds aren’t polished to sparkle, and it’s the raw look that gives Polki jewelry it’s distinct look.

Because Polki jewelry is made of diamonds, it goes without saying that the pieces are typically expensive. It’s a sign of wealth and status to own Polki jewelry and these are typically cherished and passed down the generations as precious heirlooms.

Jali Jewelry (Jadau Technique)

title: A Diamante Of Elegance
bodyhtml:
Over a spanning period of time buying gold & diamond jewelry has been a wellspring of happiness and prosperity. For Asians, wearing jewelry is a blend of fashion & emotion. A rhythm of ethnicity chimes in the corridors of Indian families during festive seasons, as they buy gold ornaments on rituals as a symbol of good luck.

Mornings vibe with a soft fragrance of henna, songs of devotion, and garlands of marigold & mango leaves all wrapped in a velvet palette full of gold & diamond accessories. Cherishing the glitz of gold & diamond is no longer a choice for women anymore. Men's interest in ornamental flamboyance is the new talk of the town. Jewelry designers in the US say that the demand for double-toned gold & diamond rings and bracelets is standing high in the market. Beating a bustling demand for matte finish gold rings and sleek hand-crafted diamond bracelets, the Malanis' have framed a grandstand catalog of designs for men's adornment section. In harmony with the desire for mounted diamond rings our artisans have carved every shade of chic in the designs

"Your jewelry introduces you before you speak."-Madison Gem

The art of ornamentation is a celebration of one's personality. Earlier people used to own gold jewels as means of treasuring more luxurious assets to enhance their wealth and surprisingly be more secretive about it. On auspicious functions like marriages, all women show up with heavy glinting ornaments as it would appreciate their prowess & prestige. The embellishment of a luxury bash of gold rings, chains, and bracelets is showered on the groom's shoulder on his wedding day from the bride's side of the family. They cherish and adore the groom as lord Narayana. Meanwhile, the groom's family believes their daughter-in-law is goddess Laxmi, so how much gold a bride carries to her in-law's home is considered as goddess Laxmi herself is walking to their home with that much good fortune & wealth.

Jewelry never makes you beautiful, it always compliments your existing beauty. A sublime touch of Polki designs polishes your classy & elegant looks. This majestic piece of art holds a special place in the jewelry collection of famous celebrities. It enhances a gentle touch of royal elegance to your party looks and thrives your dynamic personality, for sure. Though the shadow of history narrates a chapter & verse regarding the regalia of kings' wardrobes and their shimmering personalities. During those golden times, the virility and valor of a king were determined by the facades of grandeur and the ornate attires. Human emotions buried inside are stones, human emotions cherished inside are gemstones.

"You can't cry on a diamond's shoulder, and diamonds won't keep you warm at night, but they are sure fun when the sun shines."- Elizabeth Taylor

Our skilled designers have curated those solidifying human emotions into an art and decorated a moment of sapphire for our clientele. Freeze that chaos in your mind, the Malanis' has added an array of fancy unique designs of bands & bracelets. Choose a cool one that flaunts your bohemian spirit. And don't forget to compliment your jaw-dropping masculinity by putting on a fancy platinum diamond bracelet from our store. Be it the treadmill or the corporate cubicles, our classic twisted wired gold bracelet shines with you. The most loved jewel-toned gold ring collection for men is a must-try from Malani's online shopping website. Try out something that energizes your vibes. Our exquisite collection holds a perfect set of designs that allow you to go the unconventional way. Treat your generosity with an 18k white gold band which is trending as brand-spanking new this season. Pick something that rejoices your heart, radiates your individuality & fills your inner self with oodles of enthusiasm.

Malani. inc acknowledges the requirement of an imperative and ethic-grounded business and thus is transparent in its product manufacturing and resourcing details. We have firmly followed rules under human rights and environmental standards of the trade like Dodd-Frank and Signet SRSP.

title: A Filigree of Fairytales - Women's Gold & Diamond Necklace
bodyhtml:
A myriad of beautiful fairytales always surrounds women and their imaginations fly in an orb of aesthetic phenomenons. Usually, women are very fond of dreaming and droplets of fanciful thoughts make their hearts more ecstatic. They possess the crown of being the epitome of beauty and elegance.

Adornment of gold & diamond jewelry is a blissful enhancement to their individuality and it flourishes a charisma to their existence. The presence of an intuitive mind attracts an energetic sphere of creativity in them and they truly appreciate the luxury of little things in life the most. Have you ever blushed to see your pretty face in the mirror when you wore your mom's necklace or gown for the very first time? Do you cherish remembering those days of giggles and tiaras? Are you missing your grandmom's voice calling you "ah, my little queen " when you ran from corner to corner wearing her royal Patta Haaram diamond necklace? Then, hold these emotions and give a voice to such faint noises in your heart, we are hearing you.Since time immemorial, the art of ornamentation has been integral to celebrating womanhood.

To match your versatile personality we hold an array of unique patterns and designs in the women's gold & diamond jewelry section. We know you have great love and passion for Indian jewelry & its tradition. And we always appreciate your choice. Take a look at Malani's palette of light & luxury.

"Chocolate is good but jewelry is carb-free"- anonymous

A Symphony of Memories

The charm of festivities is incomplete without family & friends, their love and laughter add stars to your special day. Especially the hues of a wedding day celebration dazzle a little brighter than any other occasion. It unites two families and ties a knot of forever togetherness. Every mom weaves a dream to see her daughter as a beautiful bride since the day she gave birth to her. She visualizes her own wedding day when she sees her daughter wearing her heritage jewelry.These days women show a great interest in recreating their old jewelry with a subtle touch of nostalgia. Bespoke necklace sets are always trending in the market and hoot a style statement for divas. Pamper your little heart and relive your stories through our hand-crafted necklaces.

An Endearing Gutta Pusalu

This classic and sophisticated design draws its inheritance from Andhra Pradesh's fishing coastal vicinity which is famous for its pearl fisheries. The semantics of Gutta Pusalu is derived from two words of the Telugu language; that is 'Gutta' which means " a shoal of small fish" and 'Pusalu' meaning "beads". What an awe-inspiring history this splendid design carries! Additionally, do you know which personality traits fishes symbolize? They represent luck, health, fertility, rebirth, and determination. So! Are you already vibing? Then, flaunt your cheerful and vibrant persona and take home Malani's Gutta Pusalu today.

Every girl should add this majestic piece of art to her trousseau. Style it with a traditional outfit or an indo-western attire, it just suits all.

The Magic of Meenakari art

The inspiration behind Navaratna Meenakari work in jewelry comes from two vast horizons of history. The word 'Navaratna' is derived from two Sanskrit words 'Nava' means 'Nine' and 'Ratna' means 'Gemstones'. It acknowledges the significance of southeastern Asian culture that denotes emblems of wealth, prestige, and prodigy. It adheres to a protective power for health benefits and well-being. This art portrays an interplay of astrology and cosmology. If you believe in astrology then you can customize your gemstone jewelry from the Malanis' based on your zodiac sign. The cultural background of the Meenakari artwork connects its dots from the Persian word 'Minoo' a feminine form of heaven and the word 'Meena' states the meaning of an azuring color of the sky. It depicts an amazing arena of the Mughal empire and elaborates on the patterns and motifs that are highly inspired by the great architecture of Persia. Wear an incredible gemstone meenakari choker set with a saree or with an ethnic indo-western outfit, it turns out to be the best look of yours. Two categories of meenakari jewelry; popularly known as "Ek rang khula" and "Panchrangi Meena" set a rush in demand in the jewelry industry. A single color of enamel is carved for the entire design in the first category and five colors are pearl white, powder blue, ink blue, ruby red & forest green crafted in the second. From Mongols to Indians this design has shown its prominence for centuries among jewelry lovers. Especially, women get smitten by the regalia of Meenakari artistry.

The Razzmatazz of Polki designs

Jewelry never makes you beautiful, it always compliments your existing beauty. A sublime touch of Polki designs polishes your classy & elegant looks. This majestic piece of art holds a special place in the jewelry collection of famous celebrities. It enhances a gentle touch of royal elegance to your party looks and thrives your dynamic personality, for sure. History tells a lot about the significance and richness of this vintage design Polki necklace. It is inspired and created in the Mughal era. Artisans of Bikaner, a city in Rajasthan devote their blood and sweat to making this unique and distinctive jewel.

This antique piece of jewelry is made from uncut diamonds and comes in its original form with a non-faceted finish. A great drive of enthusiasm attracts modern connoisseurs to experiment with Polki designs. Explore the fusion of uncut diamonds with your raw personality & make your entry as a glamorous diva at every party you go to.

"I have enough jewelry." -Said no one, ever.

A Casket of Diamonds

Let the blue sapphires manifest your success, and give a shout-out to your victory by adorning a diamond necklace. Unveil your vulnerability and greet the world with your scars, be unapologetically yourself. Sprinkle the light of your aura wherever you go. Be it your workplace or a pavilion of challenges, march your heart on with an abundance of possibilities. Awaken the goddess inside you and adore your freedom with our emerald diamond necklace. It is entirely okay to be a wild mess and break the shell of a cocoon.


Your selfless and unconditional love for others is more expensive than any diamond, just quote them that way. Honor your soul with Malani's precious ruby diamonds and gemstones. Nourish your persuasive personality with gentleness. You are born beautiful, just say cheers to that. Book your dates with us to explore a wide range of Malani's exquisite designs on women's gold & diamond necklace sets. Buy home a bag full of happiness. Your smiling eyes mean sunshine to us.

title: Why Should You Invest in Gold? - Our Tips on Thumbnail
bodyhtml:
Investment is your first step towards growing affluence. Gold is the most sought-after metal for investment over the years. The possession of buying gold has been very evident for people due to a high surge in its rates. Though the idea of investment always comes with market risks, with detailed information one can learn stacks of this skill and get better equipped with time. We have come up with pertinent characteristics regarding gold investment.

"The desire of gold is not for gold. It is for the means of freedom and benefit." - Ralph Waldo

Invest In Gold Coin & Gold Jewelry:

Gold is an aegis in times of financial crisis. It has more liquidity in comparison to other assets. Whichever investment field it is; nothing can assure return and flexibility as Gold does. For instance, you can buy and sell Gold within minutes. But to liquidate FDs, bonds, real estate or stock marketing into cash is a very time taking affair. Dating back to history, many governments were seen clearing their debts using gold reserves. In the time of emergency gold is your real friend. That's why in earlier times people believed in the tradition of gifting gold jewelry at the time of marriage aiming for future security. A rich collection of gold coins in different sizes and weights are available on the Malani Jewelers online shopping website. Buy a classic QUEEN coin or a beautiful LAXMI coin in 22k gold and bring home the bliss of wealth and prosperity. Gold coins are precious metals that you can gift to your friends on special occasions.

Name something which is fashionable, durable and profitable at the same time. Yes, it is none other than gold jewelry. You can wear your desirable jewelry and still can attribute it to your asset. Gold jewelry can be designed with all types of gold. It gives a pleasant experience and also adheres to heirloom jewelry. As per budget and wish one can buy any amount of gold jewelry and keep it as a luxury of wealth. Buying gold jewelry includes making charges which vary from design to design.

Know Your Gold Type:

  1. 18 KARAT - This type of gold is made out of 18 parts of gold and 6 parts of other metals like copper or silver etc. 18k gold is mostly desired for making regular-wear jewelry, diamond rings & watches. Also, it is less expensive as compared to 22k & 24k gold. Both 18k white gold and rose gold are more popular in the jewelry industry as 18k gold can hold diamonds firmly. Get the latest and most charming rose gold diamond studded necklace, rings and long drops from Malani's exquisite collection of unique designs in all kinds of jewelry.

  2. 22 KARAT - This type of gold is comprised of 22 parts of gold and two parts of other metals/alloys like copper, silver, nickel & zinc. It is also known as 916 gold because it contains 91.67% pure gold. Jewelry like gold bracelets, bangles, gold jhumaks and royal gold necklaces are made out of 22k gold for their purity and credibility.

  3. 24 KARAT - It is comprised of 24 parts of gold and as per market rates it is 99.9 per cent pure. As 24k gold is a malleable and ductile metal mostly it is not used for regular use jewelry. However, a small amount of alloy is mixed to make 24k gold coins to keep them long-lasting. Buy beautiful idols of God in 24k gold from Malani Jewelers. Gold bars are also made out of 24k gold which stands out as a profit-assuring investment.

"Gold and silver is money, everything else is credit." - J.P. Morgan

The Graph Index:

Currently (Dated: 20/12/22) the price of 24k gold for 10 grams is $575.51 USD and for 22k gold the price of 10 grams is $526.735 USD respectively. In the last 5 years, the graph rate in the gold price has been significantly increasing. It shows the market value and credibility of this coveted metal have always been high. The dawn of history has recorded a dedicated obsession for preserving gold as a means of wealth. It is believed the power of a kingdom can be best determined by the amount of gold and other precious gems they reserve. Earlier people used gold in the form of idols and jewelry. During times of war, many countries initiated trading Gold as a medium of exchange. Even today, the trading business of gold is prevailing because of its flexibility to buy and sell. The rise and fall in gold rates can have major influences on a country's economy. There are many factors that row up fluctuations in the commerce of a state like currency markets, inflation/deflation, interest rates, equity markets and demand for investment in jewelry. Considering all the pros and cons of investment it can be concluded that your money on gold is worth it from all horizons of possibility.

Thanks for Reading.


Have a happy and secure investment.

title: Thanksgiving Day - A Carnival of Expressing Gratitude
bodyhtml:
An exhilarating spirit of celebrating the glorious history and praising God for blessing people with abundant harvesting sounds synonymous with every house in America on Thanksgiving Day. The chirping of birds on a chilly morning sprinkles an aroma of nostalgia on the fourth Thursday of November, every year.

An azuring sky welcomes the Great American Dream with an open arm to soar high. An anthem of merriment & valor is sung all over the country and the ripples of happiness touch the shores of families after a long wait to observe this annual holiday with lots of gifts and surprises. Holding each other's hands at the dining table and praying to the lord, thanking Him for everything HE has bestowed upon people is a rich and sacred age-old ritual followed on the eve of Thanksgiving day. Lets sing the song of thankfulness tuning with the lyrics of appreciation and happiness written by the great poet Pierpoint.

" For each perfect Gift of Thine
To our race so freely given,
Graces human and Divine,
Flowers of earth, and buds of Heaven:
Christ, our God, to Thee we raise
This our Sacrifice of Praise.-"Folliott Pierpoint

Rituals of this festival play a vital role in enhancing the significance of its deep-rooted culture & values and at the same time tickles a bubble of excitement. On this auspicious day, people host a banquet feast for their near and dear ones followed by a breaking off of the y-shaped wishbone, a thrilling football match, and clinking cheers of wine & music. There is a very interesting fact behind this wishbone ritual, whoever splits the bigger one is believed to have all wishes get fulfilled in the future. So, what are you waiting for? Make the winner's wish come true, and gift a jewel box of dreams and prosperity from Malani's collections.

"When asked if my cup is half-full or half-empty my only response is that I am thankful I have a cup." - SAM LEFKOWITZ

"Good food always brings a good mood." A large Roasted Turkey placed in the center of the dining table sets the mood of the party. As per tradition, the head of the family performs the carving of Turkey. Kids to youngsters and even elderly people everyone is mad over this finger-licking yummy dish. A palate full of sweet and savory delicacies is served with love. Who says the bird happens to be the hero of all dishes? The real fun of this fiesta lies in the flavors of side dishes. A long list of enticing and flavorful quintessential Thanksgiving side dishes recipes is being cooked in millions of kitchens in America, keeping the classic touch intact and mashed potatoes come top on the list. A forkful of turkey dipped in mashed potatoes and cranberry sauce is a mouth-watering combination, most people relish. Other complimenting side dishes that rule the dinner table are stuffing, sprouts, sweet potato casserole, gravy, and a green bean casserole. " All is well that ends well." Must have heard this phrase before, right? Without a spoonful of a cakey dessert, how can your Thanksgiving dinner be complete? Having a morsel of pumpkin pie on Thanksgiving dinner connects the dots of memory lane and thoughts of those soothing palms of your granny fill your face with cheerfulness.

"Forever on Thanksgiving, the heart will find the pathway home." -Wilbur D. Nesbit


What can be a perfect gift for your wife than a Malani's rose gold & diamond necklace set on this jovial day of beanfeast to express your love and gratitude for her? The Black Friday sale is on, hop on it and don't miss out on our unique designs with amazing offers. The beginning of such a celebration can not be done silently. Sprinkle some glow on your mom's face and gift her a pair of gold bangles from our shop. Surprise your daughter with a solitaire diamond pendant set from Malani's stores, when she is busy whistling for her favorite team in the gallery of a football stadium. And witness her happiness flying high beyond the boundaries of that stadium.

"When we give cheerfully and accept gratefully, everyone is blessed." -Maya Angelou


Always wonder what could be the right moment to share your feelings of love and gratitude for your Chef husband, who cooks awesome food for you; then it is just the right time to gift him a sleek platinum diamond bracelet from Malani's online shopping website. Serve food, emotion, and elegance on one plate, and let our casket of diamonds accompany your dining table this year. The festivity of thanksgiving always springs up Christmas vibes too and the furls of all jingling whoop-de-do. Make your hearts dance in the spirit of conviviality and joyousness, because we are here for taking care of your stylish looks and spreading the sparkles of your aura. We have gifts for all your family members.

Let your luck sit in the lap of luxury on this Thanksgiving Day.

Happy Thanksgiving Day

title: Make Your New Year and Christmas Celebrations Full of Surprises with Our Top 6 Gifting Ideas
bodyhtml:
The season of jingle bells & Santa Claus has finally arrived. A new sun is shining up through clouds to radiate the baubles of celebrations, so, blow up the winter chill and turn on the lights of the Christmas tree in full swing. Are you already humming the carollings and giggling in the rhythm of "Ho! Ho! Ho!"? Christmas celebrations come along with a whirlwind of activities; starting from buying & decorating gifts for friends & family to baking a yummy cake & the Gingerbread house set up for kids, the list simply rolls on.
What can be a better opportunity than Christmas or New Year's eve to treat your loved ones with amazing gifts? Make them feel what they have never felt before. Their unconditional love for you is worth a thousand beautiful plans and surprises. To bring a hearty smile to their face read our top 6 gifting ideas listed below.

" Christmas is the day that holds all time together " - Alexander Smith

    1. Pendant Sets


The art of ornamentation reveals a lot about women's persona. The idea of gifting jewelry never disappoints, though it depends on how deeply you have observed her choices. When it comes to gifting jewelry we should always go for something that is unique and easy to go with. If she is a working lady or likes to wear light-weight ornaments then a pair of sleek and fashionable pendant sets will go with her all kinds of looks. If you want to buy gold & diamond pendant sets online in the US at a budget-friendly price then Malani Jewelers stands out the best. Be it a floral design or an antique minakari design, or maybe a ruby emerald or solitaire diamond pendant set, Malani Jewelers have a unique collection of all kinds of pendant sets. So, what are you waiting for? This Christmas adore her enchanting beauty & gift her a pair of Gold or Diamond Pendant sets.

  1. Finger Bracelets

Are you really confused about what to gift your girlfriend who is choosy and modern? Well, to impress choosy people is very tough. But we should never stop trying. These days funky and unique jewelry designs are trending. Finger bracelets add an extra charm to women's beauty. The interesting fact about this jewelry is, it can be styled with almost all kinds of outfits. But with formal outfits, finger bracelets do not go well. It will look chunky and gaudy. So, except for this particular outfit, this piece of fancy jewelry can be kept as an embellishment of flamboyance and luxury in her treasure box. Go for it.

  1. Diamond Rings

Already feeling goosebumps? We know you have been waiting really long to propose to her on a special day. And the special day is not too far! If you have decided about the place then let us help you with the gift. Make her fairytale dream true leaving no effort to win her heart. First, get a bouquet of red roses along with a champagne bottle and write a heartfelt letter to her. Buy a blue sapphire or classic solitaire diamond ring, please be sure about her ring size. A customized diamond ring is definitely a win-win chance to impress her. Diamonds will bring out the elegance to her aura.Ask her out those magical words of three, four or five going on your knees popping up the jewel box. Don't forget to capture her epic reaction she will definitely ask for it later. No woman ever said no to a diamond.

  1. Gold Clipons

A perfect piece of jewelry always works like icing on the cake. Gift your loved ones a pair of shimmering diamond clipons in 18k rose gold from Malani's latest collection of stunning clipons. Make her New Year extra special by creating a whimsical ambience for her. Let her guess what is inside the gift box. A multi-layer gift wrapping on the jewelry box will give her bubbles of excitement. Also, don't forget to bring a hand written greeting card or thank you note for her. This gesture of yours will simply multiply her happiness.

  1. A Luxury Watch

This New Year, gift the man of your life a luxury watch. Let him spend the best time of the year with style. You must know the personality for whom you are buying it. If he is adventurous by nature then get him an exceptionally resistant watch that is durable. A platinum-shaded watch with a great corrosion protection feature will enhance a subtlety of elegance and class to his personality. You can visit Malani Jewelers' online shopping website to get a wide range of collections of luxury watches. While shopping for watches a few things you need to keep in mind like checking the warranty date and choosing an untarnished dial surface with a functional second & minute needle. Also, smartwatches are trending these days in the market for both men & women as these watches come in both budget-friendly and expensive prices having unique features like step counting, heartbeat reading and screen touch facility.

It has a craze among health freak people. Though, the idea of gifting a luxury watch is always a happy choice because men have different levels of love for luxury watches. Go for this gifting idea blindly and have a great time ahead.

  1. Diamond set of Bangles

No woman ever said I have enough jewelry. Women always love to add new and classic ornaments to their jewelry boxes. This Christmas, gift your lady love a royal and charming pair of rose gold diamond bangles from Malani Jewelers. You can style these types of diamond studded Bangles with traditional outfits to spread royale elegance in every place you go to. Compliment your special occasions with a gentle touch of luxury.

"The best of all gifts around any Christmas tree: the presence of a happy family all wrapped up in each other." - Burton Hills

Wishing you a Merry Christmas and an Amazing New Year in 2023.

title: 'Mangalsutra' - A Sacred Thread of Commitment
bodyhtml:
History has preserved a wellspring of interesting jewelry-related facts and the art of ornamentation. The concept of Mangalsutra and its designs denotes a rich cultural background and has evolved over centuries. The semantics of 'MangalSutra' refers to a Sanskrit word that means a 'sacred thread'. The groom ties the knot of Mangalsutra around the bride's neck is believed to be a prevalent ritual in Hindu Weddings. From traditional single yellow thread/THAALI design to modern black beads embedded with a pendant design, the necklace Mangalsutra has varied from region to region. Generally, black, red, gold and white beads are used to make Mangalsutra. It is commonly believed that the sacred thread of Mangalsutra defines the bonding of Lord Shiva and Goddess Parvati. The gold portion and black beads in Mangalsutra embody Goddess Parvati and Lord Shiva, respectively.

"Keep stars with you in the form of a diamond." - anonymous

The Saga of Black Beads:

Black beads are dots that connect two hearts. It symbolises the significance of marriage. An ideal relationship is built on profound trust, deep understanding and mutual efforts. Mangalsutra is perceived as a sacred thread of commitment for a lifetime of togetherness. Malani Jewelers has added an array of beautiful designs in Gold Mangalsutras to their latest collection. Have a glimpse of our luxury palette.

Shades of Vintage Design:

Vintage design jewelry always carries a special place in the gallery of all types of ornaments. Women have always loved the richness of antique design jewelry. Though, these days fusion of traditional and modern jewelry is trending. Malani Jewelers has come up with charming minakari work in their Gold Mangalsutras which blends well with all kinds of ethnic wears.

An Aesthetic Beauty:

The interplay of natural phenomena and human emotions is a great source of inspiration to carve floral and leaf-shaped designs in Jewelry. A soothing sense of peace and harmony comes along with these designs. It is believed that both husband and wife are like twin stiff feet of a compass if one stays in the centre and the other makes the circle complete. Inspired by such profound bondings we have added circle-design mangalsutra pendants to our collection. Browse Malani Jewelers to find more of an aesthetic touch in Gold Mangalsutras.

Are you looking for a glinting piece of jewelry that can be styled as a necklace and a chain? Visit Malani Jewelers' online shopping site to buy a three-layer beads design mangalsutra with multipurpose usage. It also comes with a matching earrings design. Compliment your Indian outfit with this alluring set of Gold Mangalsutras necklaces in 22k gold. Malani Jewelers has come up with a mesmerizing piece of Gold Mangalsutras that carries two floral pendants in different sizes and colors to complement the institution of marriage which is a union of two different personalities. Accept differences with love.

"A great marriage is not when the 'perfect couple' comes together. It is when an imperfect couple learns to enjoy their differences." - Dave Meurer


Trending Designs in White Gold Mangalsutra:

Have you checked our new collection of fancy Mangalsutra designs on our online shopping website? If not, then scroll now to find elegant and stylish designs in 18k white gold. Wearing Mangalsutra is a form of expressing love. And your expression does not need to look heavy, it can look light and elegant. Buy a set of diamond-studded Mangalsutra & earrings in 18k white gold that can be styled with both indo-western outfits. Flaunt fashion and emotion in one go. Diamond symbolises infinity. If you want to show your infinite love for your wife but are unable to find a perfect gift that suits the meaning, then what can be the best choice other than a sleek diamond Mangalsutra? Gift her five connecting diamond pendant design Mangalsutra and let her count the diamonds of love, respect, trust, commitment and forever togetherness.

Charming Designs in Rose Gold Mangalsutra:

Pieces of jewelry that are made out of a combination of rose gold and diamond always stand out as a favorite of all. Malani Jewelers always come with trendy and remarkable designs in all types of jewelry. This charming and beautiful piece of rose gold and diamond Mangalsutra design got its cord of inspiration from the tale of two souls and an incredible journey of love. Wear this majestic piece of jewelry to spread sprinkles of prettiness around you. Take a virtual tour of our website to find an exquisite collection of Mangalsutra designs in both gold & diamond sections. Celebrate beads of companionship.

The thought of the Valentine's Day celebration itself fills our hearts with bubbles of excitement and takes us to a land of fairytales. Any celebration without gifts seems incomplete, and the most special thing about a gift on Valentine's Day is the idea & effort of your loved ones that go into it. title: This HOLI, Celebrate the Festival of Colors in Style with Our Timeless Jewelry
bodyhtml:
Let the sunshine in with vibrant colors and mesmerizing jewelry into your life this Holi. The most awaited and exhilarating festival Holi is a famous Indian festival that falls every year on the full moon day in March, known as Falguna per the Hindu calendar. This festival marks the arrival of spring and the end of winter, a time of renewal and rejuvenation. It celebrates spring which cherishes new beginnings, growth, and prosperity. The festival of Holi is celebrated as a devotional tribute to the eternal love of Lord Krishna and Radha. The ritual of Holika Dahan is also popularly observed in parts of the country, signifying the victory of good over evil.

"Holi is the day to express love with colors. It is a time to show affection. All the colors on you are of love." - Anonymous.

title: Explore Our Timeless Charm of Gold on This Akshaya Tritiya

On this propitious occasion of Akshaya Tritiya, we wish you a life full of prosperity, happiness, and success. The word "Akshaya" means "eternal" or "never diminishing," and "Tritiya" means "the third day." The festival is considered auspicious as it is believed that any good deeds or ventures initiated on this day will bring prosperity, wealth, and success. If you are looking for the perfect adornment to mark this special occasion, we invite you to procure the jewelry of your dreams from our eclectic collection of jewelry pieces. Do you know?

  • Have you ever been fascinated by gemstones and their species? Many valuable species include Quartz, Corundum, Tourmaline, and others. You will be amazed that everyone's favorite Ruby and Sapphire gemstones have come from the Corundum species.
  • Do you like the rainbow? The Sapphire like the rainbow too. As colors of the Sapphire come in every color of the rainbow.
  • Pomegranate seeds resemble Garnet gemstones due to their luster and red color; though garnet comes in variant colors, but mainly comes in red. Interestingly, the name 'Garnet' has been originally derived from pomegranate.
  • All minerals can be gemstones, but not all gemstones can be minerals. Most gemstones are made of minerals, but few are known as non-minerals.

title: Unveil The Exquisite Elegance of Our Pushtaini Collection
bodyhtml:
Step into the world of Malani Jewelers' Pushtaini Collection, a breathtaking assortment of jewels that exude elegance, sophistication, and inheritance. Adorn the timeless splendor of our treasures with a rich tapestry of history, culture, and artistry woven into every jewelry piece. Make a statement with our surreal designs oozing imperial impressions from our eclectic collection that fits for a majestic look.

Traditional jewelry is an art form that has survived the test of time and still remains relevant today. - Anonymous.


Hey there! Are you ready to go on time travel to witness our treasured alluring gold ornaments? Then let's discover Malani Jewelers' fiesta of Antique galore! Imagine being transported back in time to a world of grandeur and opulence, where every piece of jewelry tells a story of India's rich cultural heritage. From ornate choker sets to intricately designed bangles, every piece is a testament to the artistic prowess of skilled Indian artisans. Choker sets are a classic piece of jewelry that has been making a comeback in recent years. Try our ornate choker sets that sit snugly around the neck and come in various styles, including single-strand, multi-strand, and statement pieces.

Wearing our Minakari choker set with Kundan is not just about adding beauty to your outfit but embracing our centuries-old cultural vehemence. The enchanting Minakari work on this choker set is a nod to the marvel of Indian culture, while the Kundan stones speak to the luxurious taste of Indian royalty. Whether you're a connoisseur of antique jewelry or just looking for a special gift, Malani Jewelers' Pushtaini Collection has something for everyone. So, why wait? Come and explore the wonder of our divinely graceful designs.


The Gemstone Studded Gold Maang Tikka is a stunning piece of jewelry that will surely wow people around you. Create a fusion of traditional and modern styles with our versatile accessory that can be paired with any ethnic outfit. The sparkling brilliance of gemstones is carefully set in a floral pattern to create a stunning visual impact and enhance glamor to any gorgeous attire. The Maang Tikka is not only aesthetically pleasing but is easy to carry with a secure fastening that ensures it stays in place all day long. Our gemstone studded gold Maang Tikka is the perfect accessory to elevate your ethnic ensemble and make you stand out from the crowd.

Indian jewelry is not just an accessory, it's a legacy that we pass down from generation to generation. - Anonymous.


The lotus enamel Minakari pendant set from our classic Pushtaini Collection is a stunning piece of jewelry that will surely catch the eye of anyone who sees it. The pendant set stands out with a beautifully crafted pendant that depicts a blooming lotus flower, symbolizing purity and spiritual enlightenment. The Minakari work on the pendant is a fine example of ancient Indian art, where colorful enamels create intricate designs on metal surfaces. The enamels' bright and bold colors add a pop of vibrancy to any ensemble. The pendant is accompanied by matching earrings that perfectly complement its design, making it a complete set for your special occasion.

Our antique collection, embellished with precious gemstones and engravings, boasts a regal charm transcending time and space. Celebrate the treasure trove of rare and exquisite jewelry pieces, cherishing India's legacy of art, culture, and tradition. Come, immerse yourself in the magic of Indian heritage jewelry and discover the magnificence of Malani Jewelers' Pushtaini Collection, where classic Indian jewelry sings its sweetest melody.

Whether rocking a casual daytime look or getting glammed up for a night out, this pendant is the perfect accessory to complete your ensemble. Wear it close to your heart and feel its protective energy surrounding you. Let it serve as a stylish reminder to stay positive and keep negativity at bay. Our Diamond Evil Eye Pendant in 18k rose gold is a true embodiment of both beauty and meaning, and it's waiting to become your new favorite piece of jewelry.

title: Dazzle up Your Gorgeous Outfit with Our Flawless Assortment of VVS/EF Diamond Jewelry
bodyhtml:
Welcome to the radiant extravagance of Malani Jewelers' VVS/EF diamond jewelry collection, where glamor meets individuality and jewelry becomes a language of self-expression. Get ready to dive into the dazzling world of exquisite diamond adornments to mark a statement and compliment your ageless beauty.

When it comes to investing in diamonds, choosing VVS/EF diamonds offers unparalleled advantages. VVS stands for "Very Very Slightly Included," which is a clarity grading for diamonds, and EF refers to "Exceptional White" in the color grading of diamonds. The VVS clarity ensures near-flawless perfection, with virtually invisible inclusions, allowing the diamond to dazzle with unmatched brilliance. The exceptional white EF color guarantees a stunningly pure, colorless appearance, maximizing the diamond's inherent radiance. Opting for VVS/EF diamonds ensures a timeless and valuable investment, as their superior quality and rarity make them highly sought-after. Experience the epitome of luxury and sophistication with our VVS/EF diamonds, securing a lasting symbol of prestige and beauty that will be treasured for generations to come.

From head-turning stand out pieces to delicate treasures that whisper elegance, let our premium collection be your style compass to navigate the ever-evolving trends and must-have jewelry essentials. Let's upgrade your jewelry game and sparkle with unabashed brilliance!

Raksha Bandhan is the most celebrated festival for Asians, which appreciates the precious bond between brothers and sisters. This joyous occasion is followed by an auspicious ritual where the sister ties a silk thread knot (Bandhan) around her brother's wrist, asking for safety (Raksha). As the ceremony of Rakhi approaches, finding the perfect gift for your sister becomes a delightful quest, isn't it? bodyhtml:
Krishna Pendant

Janmashtami is a revered Hindu festival commemorating the divine birth ( janma) of the deity Krishna, occurring on the auspicious eighth (ashtami) day of the waning moon in the month of Bhadrapada, which falls between the months of August and September. The numeral eight also holds an additional profound connotation in the Krishna mythology, signifying his position as the eighth child of his mother, Devaki. Celebrate the joyous and divine occasion of Janmashtami in all its glory with Malani Jewelers' enchanting jewelry designs. Ganesh Chaturthi, also known as Vinayaka Chaturthi, is an auspicious festival that celebrates the birth of Lord Ganesha on the sacred month of Bhadrapada as per Hindu Calendar. bodyhtml:

The word "Navratri" is derived from two Sanskrit words: "Nav," which means "nine," and "Ratri," which means "night." This festival typically occurs in the autumn season, usually falls in the month of October (Ashwin), and is dedicated to the worshiping of Navdurga (9 forms of goddess durga). Amidst the resplendent tapestry of Navratri celebrations, indulge in the dazzling sparkle of Malani Jewelers' versatile necklace sets collection that emerges as a breathtaking adornment. title: This Diwali Let Your Loved Ones Sparkle with Our Breathtaking Diamond Jewelry Collection
bodyhtml:
Malani Jewelers

The festival of Diwali is celebrated as the triumph of light over darkness and good over evil. The term Diwali also spelled as Deepavali originates from two Sanskrit terms, 'deep' (clay lamp) and 'avali' (a row), representing a line of luminous lights guiding towards the path of righteousness. According to the hindu calendar, this joyous festival is commemorated on the 15th day of the month of Kartik coinciding with Amavasya every year. Let Malani Jewelers illuminate your precious moments with our exquisite diamond jewelry collection. We have come up with a series of 2 blogs on breathtaking diamond jewelry collections to make your Diwali celebrations grand. Explore a wide range of stunning Jhumkha designs to opulent bangle-bracelet patterns.

title: This Bhai Dooj Celebrate Your Precious Bond with Our Timeless Men's Jewelry Collection
bodyhtml:
Malani Jewelers:Honor Your Brother with Timeless Jewelry from Malani Jewelers

Bhai Dooj is a traditional Hindu festival which is widely observed just after Diwali, the auspicious festival of lights, celebrating the beautiful bond between brothers and sisters. As a part of the ritual during this festival, sisters perform a traditional tilak ceremony on their brothers' foreheads with Roli and Akshat to convey blessings for a bright and prosperous future. This year, make your brother's day by gifting him the perfect blend of love and luxury with our spectacular designs in gold jewelry. Explore the enduring sparkle of men's jewelry in our premium collection and find that perfect gift which will let your precious bond shine brighter.

title: Malani Jewelers Strikes Gold Again with The Best of Florida 2023 AWARD
bodyhtml:
Malani Jewelers:Best of Florida 2023 - Exquisite Fine Jewelry in Tampa & Orlando

It warms our hearts at Malani Jewelers to have adorned your joyous moments, sprinkling a little magic of timeless jewelry into your celebrations over the years. With a rich history dating back to 1897, our family-run business has grown to become a prominent name in the jewelry industry. Every step of our journey has been guided by our clients, who have played an integral role in shaping our success story. And we are thrilled to announce that we have added another feather into our hat this October with the accolade of Best of Florida 2023 which we owe to our loyal clientele.

With showrooms established in Tampa, Florida, Dallas, and Texas, we have expanded our reach to serve you better. Acknowledging the digital era, our pioneering online platform, Malanijewelers.com, provides you with a seamless, secure and exclusive shopping journey which is just a click away. Our skilled artisans pour their passion into every piece, ensuring impeccable craftsmanship and unparalleled quality at every turn.


Sharing Our Success Stories with You

Let's take a closer look at some of the prestigious awards that have motivated our journey.

The Luxury Brand of the Year Award in 2020

In 2020, Malani Jewelers was graced with the esteemed Luxury Brand of the Year Award. This acknowledgment serves as a reflection of our resolute journey for perfection and the extraordinary eminence that defines each jewel in our assemblage. We are profoundly thankful for this recognition, which serves as a wellspring of inspiration for us to perpetually elevate our benchmarks and provide unparalleled artistry.


The Prestigious Best of Georgia Award in 2022

The subsequent year brought another noteworthy triumph as Malani Jewelers was crowned the victor of the Best of Georgia Award 2022 winning the nominations for the best jewelry store award by the Georgia Business Journal. This esteemed validation solidifies our commitment to delivering an unmatched shopping sojourn and the finest gems to our esteemed clientele. We express our heartfelt appreciation to the Georgia Business Journal and our wonderful clients for their unflinching loyalty, which has been pivotal in this remarkable achievement.

The Coveted Best of Florida Award in 2023

This October 2023 marked another significant milestone as Malani Jewelers was lauded with the prestigious Best of Florida Award in the category of Best Jewelry Store by The Guide to Florida. This acknowledgment resonates deeply with our dedication to fashioning exquisite jewelry that encapsulates the beauty of cherished moments. As we reflect on the journey that has brought us these remarkable accolades, we are reminded of the significance of every client's story and the trust they place in us to be a part of their most treasured moments. At Malani Jewelers, our story is one of enduring excellence and commitment, crafting a legacy that has always been glittered through time. We extend our sincerest gratitude to our happy clients for their trust and continued support, as it is their stories and experiences that continue to inspire us greatly.

Explore our exclusive collection of meticulously crafted gold & diamond jewelry on our website and visit our stores to witness the timeless beauty that has garnered these prestigious rewards. Follow us on social media for the latest updates, exclusive offers, and insights into the world of fine jewelry. Thank you for stopping by Malani Jewelers, your trusted destination for purchasing GIA, IGI, GAL, and EGL Certified Diamonds, each one as unique as the moment it captures. Your trust and support inspire us to continually strive for excellence in everything we do.

Be a part of our legacy with the splendor of stunning jewelry

title: This Thanksgiving Day Express Gratitude To Your Loved Ones with Our Gold and Diamond Jewelry Designs
bodyhtml:
As the crisp autumn leaves carpet the ground and the ritual of gifting, decorations, and joyful gatherings fills the festive vibe, it's that magical time of the year again - Thanksgiving Day. When the season of gratitude unfolds, there's no better time to cherish moments and express appreciation for the presence of loved ones. At Malani Jewelers, we believe in turning moments into ecstatic memories and celebrations into cherished treasures. Whether you're expressing heartfelt affection to your beloved grandmother or your life partner, our collection captures every gleaming detail. Browse through our stunning array of pieces, each intricately designed to symbolize your note of appreciation. Because when words fall short, let the sparkle of our jewelry convey the depth of your emotion.


This Thanksgiving, honor the matriarch of your family with a truly exceptional gift - our spellbinding Diamond Set of Bangles. Delicate, yet radiantly timeless, these bangles are more than just jewelry as they encapsulate the brilliance of shared laughter, whispered secrets, and the wisdom imparted through generations. As she graces her wrist with this scintillating marvel, she not only adorns jewelry but a tale of family bonds and enduring grace. Gift her not just with sparkling jewelry but with a tangible expression of your family's love and respect. Let each facet of this jewelry be a testament to her resilience that glimmer an ode to her wisdom. This timepiece isn't merely a gift; it's a composition of love, a melody of thankfulness. Make this Thanksgiving a poetic celebration of her irreplaceable presence in your family.


Transcend the ordinary and gift your wife the epitome of joy - our marvelous Diamond Necklace Set that illuminates the essence of your love. Each delicate link in this scintillating jewelry piece is a testament to the precious moments you've shared. Imagine her delight as she unveils this casket of happiness adorned with diamonds that sparkle with the promise of countless tomorrows. Beyond being a necklace, it's a wearable memory and a reminder of the joyous chapters you've written together. As she gracefully wears this dazzling set, let it be a reflection of your appreciation for the myriad ways she brings happiness into your life. Go beyond words and let this magical neckpiece be the radiant symbol of your gratitude, making the day truly unforgettable for the queen of your heart.

Surprise your sister with a gift as special as she is - our radiant Long Drop Diamond Earrings. Beyond dazzling accessories, these earrings will be a canvas for her unique style. Let her pair them with a stylish updo to accentuate this graceful drop or witness it taking the center stage with a classic little black dress. The versatility of these earrings makes them a perfect treat for her fashion repertoire. This Thanksgiving, celebrate not just the earrings but the unique bond you share. Reminisce about the times you've laughed until your sides hurt, offered support through thick and thin, and the many adventures you've embarked on together. So, as she dons these masterpieces with flair, let them be a radiant tribute to your shared journey - one that's as timeless as the diamonds themselves.

As you embrace the spirit of giving, may these jewels not only amplify your expressions of gratitude but also become cherished symbols of the love, joy, and shared experiences that define this season of thanks. Here's to a Thanksgiving adorned with both elegance and emotion, where the beauty of the jewelry reflects the beauty of the connections that make our lives truly remarkable.

Happy Thanksgiving Day!

In the world of jewelry, certain pieces stand out not just for their beauty but for the stories they tell and the artistry they embody. If you are looking for your new statement piece, unveil a wide range of spellbinding Chandbali designs on Malani Jewelers’ online shopping website and procure the one that will complement your apparel.


Don’t Think Twice Before Buying This Marvelous 22K Gold Chandbali

What sets our Gold Chandbali Earrings apart is their ability to effortlessly blend tradition with modernity. Whether paired with a traditional saree or a contemporary fusion outfit, these earrings accent droplets of grace and sophistication to any ensemble. Their versatility makes them a must-have in every jewelry collection. Whether you want to treat yourself or buy a gift for your loved ones, our collection of intricately crafted Chandbali designs will surely amaze with its unavoidable enchantment. For those who prefer a minimalist style, let our Chandbali designed with droplets of Jhumka be the focal point in your look. When it comes to truly letting your earrings take center stage and become the star of the show, consider creating a stunning contrast by pairing them with sophisticated outfits. Step into grandeur showcasing our enthralling pieces.


Own The Radiance of Our 22K Chandbali Earrings!

Whether you're seeking a perfect pair of 22k Chandbali Earrings to turn heads on a special occasion or add a touch of forever charm to your favorite traditional wear, our designs will let your inner muse flourish. These captivating earrings are named after the Hindi words for "moon" (chand) and "earrings" (bali) and gracefully embody the celestial beauty of a crescent moon. Featuring a long and dangly design, these jewel pieces boast a main curved body at the top that flares out decoratively. Imagine wearing a jewelry that is crafted with intricate layers of petals, graceful leaves, and charming tiny droplets of gold that celebrate nature's artistry in every sway. Don't wait for a special occasion to shine, with our earrings make every day special.

Chandbali earrings have a rich historical legacy, tracing back through centuries and across cultures. Steeped in the opulent heritage of India's royal courts, Chandbali designs became beloved treasures of queens and princesses, exuding a majestic shimmer that adorned royalty with unmatched elegance. Over the time these jewels crossed borders and became a global symbol of classic charm, earning admiration from people around the world.

title: Indian Traditional Gold Jewelry for Janmashtami
bodyhtml:
5 Must-Have Jewelry for Janmashtami | Sparkle in Style 5 Must-Have Jewelry for Janmashtami | Sparkle in Style

Celebrating the festival of Janmashtami is a time of joy, piety and lively celebrations. As we mark the birth of Lord Krishna, adorning yourself with beautiful jewellery will add to the charm of the celebrations. Whether you are planning to attend a temple ceremony or a celebratory party, the right jewellery can enhance your traditional outfit. In this article, we will explore 5 must-have jewellery for Janmashtami to help you sparkle on this auspicious occasion.


1. Traditional Gold Earrings

Jumkha

3. Beautiful Bracelets

Gold Bangles
For a more opulent look, gold bangles are the right choice. Their timeless appeal and intricate designs make them a must-have for any jewellery collection.

4. Exquisite Rings

Minakari Ring in 22K Gold
Minakari rings feature intricate designs and glittering gemstones and are perfect for making a statement. They pair beautifully with other traditional jewellery.
Temple Jewellery Rings
Temple jewellery rings are inspired by the divine and feature motifs of gods and goddesses. These rings are not only beautiful but also have spiritual significance.

5. Exquisite Maang Tikkas

Maang tikkas are an essential part of traditional Indian jewellery. They add a royal touch to your look and are therefore perfect for Jamashtami.
Simple Maang Tikkas
If you prefer a more sophisticated look, opt for simple Maang tikkas. Their elegance and simplicity make them a versatile accessory that goes well with any traditional outfit.

title: Mangalsutra - A Symbol of Love and Commitment By Malani Jewelers
bodyhtml:
Diamond Mangalsutra Diamond Mangalsutra

The Mangalsutra holds a significant place in Indian tradition, symbolizing the eternal bond between husband and wife. This beautiful piece of jewelry isn't just an ornament; it represents love, commitment, and respect in a marriage. At Malani Jewelers, we understand the deep cultural importance of the mangalsutra and offer a stunning collection that embodies these timeless values.

What is a Mangalsutra?

A Mangalsutra is a sacred necklace worn by married women in Hindu culture, particularly in India. The word "mangal" means "auspicious," and "sutra" means "thread," combining to represent a thread of good fortune and well-being. Traditionally, the necklace features black beads strung together, often with a gold pendant, and is tied by the groom around the bride's neck during the wedding ceremony. The black beads are believed to protect the couple from evil and negative energies, adding to the spiritual importance of the Mangalsutra.

The Evolution of Mangalsutra Designs

While the traditional Mangalsutra was simple in design, featuring only black beads and a gold pendant, the modern-day Mangalsutra has evolved to suit contemporary tastes. Today, you can find a variety of styles, from the classic designs to more intricate and fashionable pieces.

At Malani Jewelers, we offer Mangalsutras that are timeless yet modern, allowing women to wear them proudly in both traditional and contemporary settings. Whether you are looking for a simple and elegant design or something more elaborate, we have options to suit every taste and preference.

title: What is the Most Popular Style of Necklace ? - Malani Jewelers
bodyhtml:
Popular Style of Necklace Popular Style of Necklace

When it comes to necklaces, choosing the right style can make or break your outfit, mood, and even your special moments. Jewelry has a unique way of speaking volumes about personal taste, tradition, and culture. So, what exactly is the most popular style of necklace that has captivated people for generations and continues to trend today? Let’s dive in!

The Classic Chain Necklace

One of the timeless staples in anyone’s jewelry box is the chain necklace. Be it a delicate gold chain or a thicker, statement-making one, chains work for every occasion. Why are they so popular? Their versatility allows you to dress up or dress down effortlessly. Whether worn alone for a minimal look or paired with a pendant for added charm, chain necklaces are a reliable go-to.


The Captivating Pendant Necklace

Pendant necklaces are not just accessories; they are stories hanging close to the heart. From dazzling gemstones to symbolic charms, a pendant necklace makes a personal statement. Plus, it’s a style that can transition beautifully from casual brunches to glamorous dinners. Whether you're showcasing a religious icon, your birthstone, or something deeply meaningful, pendants never go out of style.

Choker Necklaces – Retro Meets Modern

Chokers have been making waves since the 90s and show no signs of stopping. With styles ranging from sleek velvet ribbons to bold metallic bands, chokers beautifully complement plunging necklines and off-shoulder outfits. Want to make a daring fashion statement? This one is for you!


The Elegant Pearl Necklace

Pearls are synonymous with grace, class, and sophistication. Pearl necklaces are a must-have in any jewelry collection. Worn by queens and icons of style, they add an air of elegance to any attire. Perfect for weddings, evening gowns, or even office wear, they are cherished for their iridescent glow.

The Traditional Kundan Necklace

Steeped in Indian heritage, the Kundan necklace is a celebration of tradition and craftsmanship. Adorned with uncut stones and intricate designs, it’s often worn during weddings and cultural festivities. If you want to stand out and carry a piece of history around your neck, Kundan is the way to go.

Conclusion

At Malani Jewelers, we understand that every necklace tells a story. From classic chains to traditional Kundan, every piece we craft holds the power to transform not just your outfit but your memories as well. Ready to find the necklace that speaks to you?

Visit Malani Jewelers today to explore our captivating collection and let your story shine through!
